wikipedia_page.main: George Leonard Shield Pattullo (c. 1893/1894 – 13 January 1968) was a Scottish rugby union player who represented Scotland at the 1920 Five Nations Championship.Born in Colombo, he played the fullback position.

response: George Pattullo is the name of:
*George Pattullo (footballer) (1888–1953), Scottish footballer for FC Barcelona
*George Pattullo (rugby union) (c. 1893/1894–1968), Scottish rugby union player
